game.name: Monsters and Cake
game.description:
Hey, what could be better than spending time with cute monsters that have intense craving for cake! Does not excite you friends? Join Monsters And Cake and get ready to ready to fed a group of little hungry monsters with their favorite sweet recipe! These lovely creatures have full faith on your skills, so do not underestimate your power and guide them to have a particular amount of cake in each level. They are anxiously waiting for your helping hands. 

Your objective in this brand new arcade challenge is to match 3 or more monsters with the same color. When you match the monsters of the same color, you would see your monsters munch away at the cake. Try to be very fast as this is a time-based game so try to complete the mission before the time runs out in each level! Your monster would be of five colors including yellow, orange, purple, dark green and parrot green. Your monster of the same color eats cake as you match in the below of the screen. 

Match your adjacent monsters and feel free to create long chains to make them disappear from the screen! Track your level and score by looking at the top of the screen! This cute match-3 game features 10 cute and cuddly monsters and 8 delicious types of cakes that include fruit cakes, pudding, jello, chocolate and more. Enjoy this innovative hexagonial style grid game in multiple devices, including mobile phones and desktop! Try out more free matching games that you can explore alone or with your friends on atmegame.com without download!
